Package org.wildfly.plugin.deployment.resource

Class AddResourceMojo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      • org.wildfly.plugin.common.AbstractServerConnection
        • org.wildfly.plugin.deployment.resource.AddResourceMojo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo
    @Mojo(name="add-resource",
      threadSafe=true)
public class AddResourceMojo
extends AbstractServerConnection
    Adds a resource

    If force is set to false and the resource has already been added to the server, an error will occur and the operation will fail.

    Author:
    Stuart Douglas, James R. Perkins
